title: Opinion: Sidelining Black women in clinical trials is not just a moral failure. It’s bad science
description: When trial participants aren't representative, the evidence for universally adopted cancer treatment guidelines is incomplete.
content: When trial participants aren't representative, the evidence for universally adopted cancer treatment guidelines is incomplete.
